channel.title: Cannot connect to internet with linux :(
channel.description: I have linux as a dual boot, but i cannot get it to connect to my network (network is not pass worded!). I'm thinking i need some drivers on it but I don't know. It wont pick up anything in "roaming" mode.

item.title: Cannot connect to internet with linux :(
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

You probably don’t have drivers for your wireless network card.

Read full topic

item.source: Cannot connect to internet with linux :(

item.title: Cannot connect to internet with linux :(
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Theres not enough information here. What Distrobution are you using and how are you being connected to the Internet?

For an ethernet connection:
Type this into terminal

ifconfig eth0 up

and then

dhclient eth0

Read full topic
